field.label: --data-destination
field.help: Data destination to save labeled data.

field.label: --feature
field.help: Matched values of this feature will be labeled.

field.label: --values
field.help: Anomaly values to label (separate by comma).

field.label: --start-time
field.help: Label matched data from this time (YYYY-MM-ddTHH-mm-ss). ex: 2023-01-14T23-08-25

field.label: --end-time
field.help: Label matched data before this time (YYYY-MM-ddTHH-mm-ss). ex: 2023-01-14T23-08-25

field.label: --label
field.help: Value to assign to label feature
